directions: In a double boiler, melt the processed cheese. Blend in the turkey chili and diced tomatoes with green chili peppers. Mix in chicken and sour cream. Heat and stir until well blended. Serve warm.
ingredients: 2 (10 ounce) cans diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
2 (10 ounce) cans chunk chicken, drained and flaked
title: Green Chile Pepper and Tomato Chicken Dip
